GSD.product_version: versions from v3.19 to before v5.18.4
GSD.description:
usb: usbip: fix a refcount leak in stub_probe()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.4 by commit 11c65408bd0ba1d9cd1307caa38169292de9cdfb, it was introduced in version v3.19 by commit 3ff67445750a84de67faaf52c6e1895cb09f2c56. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: usb: usbip: fix a refcount leak in stub_probe()
